General.Name: Sunrise Resources Plc
General.Description: Sunrise Resources plc engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral projects in the United States and Western Australia. The company explores for gold, copper, silver, limestone, diatomite, and other base metals and industrial mineral deposits. It mines at CS Pozzolan-Perlite project and NewPerl project located in Nevada, the United States, as well as leases/option agreement in the Jackson Wash Perlite project located in Nevada, the United States. The company was formerly known as Sunrise Diamonds plc and changed its name to Sunrise Resources plc in May 2010. Sunrise Resources plc was incorporated in 2005 and is headquartered in Macclesfield, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: Silk Point, Macclesfield, United Kingdom, SK10 2BB
